body: Hello! I was playing this map and the spawn and the bridges out of spawn all got destroyed which meant it was nearly impossible to leave. Then when someone ran into the "wool room" i could not enter it so they could easily break the monument!
body_tagged: Hello! I was playing this map and the spawn and the bridges out of spawn all got destroyed which meant it was nearly impossible to leave. Then when someone ran into the "wool room" i could not enter it so they could easily break the monument!
title: Rendezvous 2 Broken?

replies.body: Your not meant to go inside :P
replies.body_tagged: Your not meant to go inside :P

replies.body: Then how on earth are you supposed to defend!

replies.body: Well your ment to stop them from getting in there like perhaps maybe block around it :3

replies.body: its supposed to be like a wool room, orky. ;)

replies.body:
The original purpose of the map was to be CTW so the wool too couldn't be entered by the same team. It was changed later because I think CTW isn't supported anymore.....

correct me if im wrong
replies.body_tagged:
The original purpose of the map was to be CTW so the wool too couldn't be entered by the same team. It was changed later because I think CTW isn't supported anymore.....

replies.body: As stated above, the map was never intended for ctm purposes, and will likely be removed from the rotations in the semi-near future.
